name: Hero.ROM
description:
Hero.ROM is a massive comedy adventure set in the grim future of what was once a vibrant fantasy kingdom. Swords and sorcery have been replaced by nanomachines and cyberspace, and the gods that used to rule the land...well...no one's heard from them in a while.

So, what happens when an ancient evil reappears to spread some old-school havoc on this brave new world? Well obviously, some destined hero is going to need to rise to save humanity.

Time for another adventure.

(Hero.ROM is being developed episodically. Currently, the first two episodes are available to play, including an Interlude episode that provides a lead-up to Episode 3. Each episode represents a massive chunk of content, as the game has been in development for the better part of 2015, so dive right in! Hope you enjoy the ride!)
